thread.title: Katy Perry Exposes Her Thong And Twerks At 2017 BRITS After Party
thread.title_full: Katy Perry Exposes Her Thong And Twerks At 2017 BRITS After Party

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Katy Perry Exposes Her Thong And Twerks At 2017 BRITS After Party
text:
Last night, Katy Perry was in London to perform at the BRITS which to my understanding is the British version of the Grammys. 
After the awards ceremony was over Perry was spotted at the club getting lit by exposing her thong and getting her twerk on. 
Katy Perry twerking to Rihanna ft. Drake's 'Work' at the 2017 #BRITs afterparty! pic.twitter.com/1AKYkMHcDy 
â€” Pop Crave (@PopCravings) February 23, 2017 

And now for the obligatory Katy Perry GIF dump.
